item.description:
Buck Naykid at The Chicken Bone In Framingham is the cover band so no need to be nervous I've been trying to do a Chicken Bone Meet Up for a long time and finally I think this one is going to stick. This is a good inexpensive alternative to going into Boston on a Saturday night.

Like Chicken Wings? This is definately the place for you then! They also have other fantabulous stuff on their menu! Im thinking we can grab a group of tables order some food/drinks and then sit/stand/mosh to the cover band at 9 until whenever.

Check out the site and RSVP because this will be a chill time!

This will be a pretty relaxed meet up - I'll even allow Maybe's (I know don't faint). I'll send out a reminder email ahead of time but no formal RSVP's will be requested by me (again don't faint)

Peace out ch'all!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll intially meet by the entrance but if you're running late call my cell phone and I'll let you know where we are
item.name: Buck Naykid at The Chicken Bone
